document.full_text: relatives used a lull in the curfew in northern nigeria on wednesday to search morgues for their loved ones, after riots triggered by disputed election results killed at least 100 people in the mostly-muslim region.
document.title: relatives search for bodies after nigeria riots
lines_and_colors: relatives used a lull in the curfew in northern nigeria on wednesday to search morgues for their loved ones, after riots triggered by disputed election results killed at least 100 people in the mostly-muslim region.
